timeline.bodyText: Lets add a comment there to say why we're skipping this and ensure we have an issue opened for us to enable it once the ee9 features that are needed for this test are available. Do this for all the tests we're skipping.
timeline.author: pnicolucci
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -38,6 +41,7 @@
  * Verify that injection is performed into several listener types.
  */
 @RunWith(FATRunner.class)
+@SkipForRepeat(EE9_FEATURES)

timeline.bodyText:
Do we even need the Servlet40 minor version test here? We already have a major/minor version test in the servlet 4.0 bucket I believe.
Lets explain why we skip the tests if that is the case.
timeline.author: pnicolucci

timeline.bodyText: We can probably remove this since we have a test here for servlet 4.0: https://github.com/OpenLiberty/open-liberty/blob/integration/dev/com.ibm.ws.webcontainer.servlet.4.0_fat/fat/src/com/ibm/ws/fat/wc/tests/WCServerTest.java#L106 and just ignore the 31 test for 4.0 and 5.0?
timeline.author: pnicolucci

timeline.message:
Initial jakarta add to fat bucket
- Added jakarta repeat test
- Added skip for features still under development (like cdi-3.0)
Added feature skip for jakarata repeat on FormLoginReadListener since feature is not ready yet
